text: Allah‌ke bada diye tomara to sudhu pratimadera puja karacha, ara tomara ekati mithya udbhabana karecha. Nihsandeha tomara allah‌ke bada diye yadera aradhana karacha tara tomadera jan'ya jibikara upare kono kartrtba rakhe na, kaje'i allah‌ra kache jibika anbesana kara o tamra'i upasana kara, ara tamra prati krtajnata jnapana kara, tamra kache'i to tomadera phiriye ana habe.
